event.title: includes the town of Ada, the nearby town of Mol (Hungarian: Mohol), and the following villages (Hungarian names are in italics): Utrine (Törökfalu) Obornjača (Völgypart-Nagyvölgy) Sterijino (Valkaisor) According to the 2011

data.event: Ada municipality includes the town of Ada, the nearby town of Mol (Hungarian: Mohol), and the following villages (Hungarian names are in italics): Utrine (Törökfalu) Obornjača (Völgypart-Nagyvölgy) Sterijino (Valkaisor) According to the 2011 census, the total population of the Ada municipality was 16,991, including: Hungarians = 12,750 (75.04%) Serbs = 2,956 (17.40%) Romani = 323 (1.90%) Others and undeclared = 962 (5.66%) All local communities in the municipality have a Hungarian majority.
